title: Fact Check: This picture of water logging is not from Delhi, here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
As heavy rainfall lashed the Delhi-NCR region, a picture of a family sitting in a flooded street went viral on social media. It is being claimed that the picture is from Delhi and Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal is not taking measures for the people affected due to heavy rainfall.

We also found this picture on Twitter with the same claim.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found it to be misleading.

On putting the picture through Google Reverse Image search, we found this picture on a tweet posted by a verified account by the name, Gurmeet Singh Meet Hayer. Along with the picture, he had claimed that the family in the picture is from Mansa District, Punjab and they were protesting against the sewage problem in their area. It is dated July 18, 2016.

In the comment section of the same post, we found a newspaper clipping from ‘Punjab Kesri’, with the same claims.

In conclusion, the above information proves that the picture in question is NOT from Delhi. It is actually from Mansa District in Punjab.
